description:
Maharatna ONGC is the largest producer of crude oil and natural gas in India, contributing around 70 per cent of Indian domestic production. The crude oil is the raw material used by downstream companies like IOC, BPCL, HPCL to produce petroleum products like Petrol, Diesel, Kerosene, Naphtha, Cooking Gas-LPG.

ONGC is India’s Top Energy Company and ranks 14th among global energy majors (Platts). It is the only Indian company to figure in Fortune’s ‘Most Admired Energy Companies’ list. ONGC ranks 226th overall in Forbes Global 2000. Acclaimed for its Corporate Governance practices, Transparency International has ranked ONGC 26th among the biggest publicly traded global giants. It is most valued public enterprise in India, and one of the highest profit-making and dividend-paying.

ONGC has a unique distinction of being a company with in-house service capabilities in all areas of Exploration and Production of oil & gas and related oil-field services. Winner of the Best Employer award, a dedicated team of over 25,000 professionals toil round the clock in challenging locations.

ONGC is an integrated energy company with interests in upstream, midstream and downstream sector of the hydrocarbon value chain, renewables, LNG, Power generation, petrochemicals and Value Added Products. 

ONGC's wholly-owned subsidiary Navratna ONGC Videsh Limited (OVL) is the biggest Indian multinational in the energy space, participating in 32 oil and gas properties in 15 countries. ONGC's subsidiary Mangalore Refinery and Petrochemicals Limited (MRPL) is a Schedule ‘A’ Miniratna, with a single-location refining capacity of 15 million tons per annum. 

ONGC subsidiary HPCL is a Maharatna CPSE, and has the second largest share of product pipelines in India with a pipeline network of more than 3370 kms for transportation of petroleum products and a vast marketing network consisting of 14 Zonal offices and 133 Regional Offices.
name: Oil and Natural Gas Corporation Ltd

updates.text:
Shape the Future of Digital Energy with #ONGC! 🌐 

Step into the role of Head Digital Projects and drive the digital transformation of India’s #Energy #Maharatna.  

ONGC, India’s largest oil & gas producer, is seeking 4 visionary professionals for a Fixed Term Engagement in:  
🔹 Asset Monetization  
🔹 Reservoir Management  
🔹 Renewables  
🔹 Asset Development Board  

✅ Who can apply? 
- Bachelor’s in Engineering (Postgraduate/MBA preferred)  
- 15+ years of expertise in digital transformation, with 4 years in senior leadership  
- Proven experience in managing large-scale digital projects  

📍 Be the force behind ONGC’s digital revolution. Apply now! 

🔗 Explore more: https://lnkd.in/g9PTkEin

Ministry of Petroleum and Natural Gas Govt of India 
Hardeep Singh Puri 
#SureshGopi
#EnergyNowAndNext #YouAreEnergy

On this auspicious #Gurpurab, #ONGC pays homage to the wisdom and compassion of Guru Nanak Dev Ji. 
His teachings of selfless service, humility, and equality inspire us as we continue our journey to empower the nation with sustainable energy. 
May His divine light guide us all toward a future of unity and prosperity. 🌸

Ministry of Petroleum and Natural Gas Govt of India 
Hardeep Singh Puri 
#SureshGopi

#EnergyNowAndNext #YouAreEnergy

Ministry of Petroleum and Natural Gas Govt of India  Additional Secretary Praveen Mal Khanooja, IA & AS, inaugurated #ONGC Pavilion at #GEOINDIA2024, in the presence of Association of Petroleum Geologists (APG) India Patron and ONGC Director (Exploration) Sushma Rawat.
A remarkable showcase of India’s geoscience capabilities, our Pavilion delves into ONGC’s 6+ decades of pioneering exploration—proudly discovering 8 of India’s 9 producing basins, essential for India’s #EnergySecurity. 
Explore the science behind seismic imaging, the thrill of discovery, and interactive Exploration Games designed to captivate one and all.
ONGC’s relentless spirit continues with cutting-edge R&D and new acreage ambitions of 500,000 sq km to fuel India’s growth. 
Join us at the forefront of #EnergyExploration. 

Hardeep Singh Puri 
#SureshGopi
#EnergyNowAndNext #YouAreEnergy

Hon'ble Minister of the Ministry of Petroleum and Natural Gas Govt of India Hardeep Singh Puri  inaugurated the 6th South Asian Geosciences Conference and Exhibition #GEOINDIA2024 on 15 November 2024, in the presence of Oil India Limited / ऑयल इंडिया लिमिटेड CMD Dr. Ranjit Rath, #ONGC Chairman Arun Kumar Singh , along with Association of Petroleum Geologists (APG) India Patron and ONGC Director (Exploration) Sushma Rawat 
Organized by APG India, the event-themed “Exploring New Dimensions of Energy Dynamics,” runs from 15 to 17 November 2024.

"With the Government of India’s support on open revenue-sharing and ease of business reforms, #India’s #energy future looks promising. Most of the exploration in future will be in deepwaters which presents huge hope and huge challenges. The current exploration cycle requires a minimum of 5 years—3 years for seismic data acquisition and processing (API) and 2 years for drilling and appraisal. Adding another 5 years for asset development in deepwaters, making the first oil cycle extend to 10 years—an unsustainable timeline in this era of energy transition. 

We must compress timelines at every stage. By adopting out-of-the-box solutions in data processing and interpretation, we can significantly accelerate progress. Given India’s energy appetite, far exceeding that of many major economies, it’s critical to reduce seismic API time to just one year. Collaboration and innovation are essential to meet this ambitious goal and secure a robust energy future."

Delivering the welcome address, the ONGC Chairman and CEO underscored the critical need for energy self-reliance to achieve #ViksitBharat. He highlighted the importance of accelerating exploration, fostering innovation, and forging partnerships to address India's energy challenges.

#SureshGopi
#EnergyNowAndNext #YouAreEnergy

“To build a Viksit Bharat, we have to Think, Dream and Do big. Unconventional decisions may have to be taken without fear. 
One area where we need to catch up is skill development, which is bogging many public enterprises. As a nation, while we are over-educated, we are under-skilled in field jobs. Public enterprises should invest in the Hon'ble Prime Minister's Internship scheme, to manage this gap. 
In #ArtificialIntelligence, we need to catch up with the world in office assignments; we can enhance process efficiencies by 25-30 per cent.
Another area to improve is to have better mediation practices for better collaboration, as legal disputes don’t serve anybody in business. ONGC has got success in this recently.” 

#ONGC Chairman Arun Kumar Singh in the 12th Confederation of Indian Industry #CIIPSESummit2024 with the theme "Viksit Bharat: Transforming PSEs into Engines of Sustainable Growth"

Ministry of Petroleum and Natural Gas Govt of India Hardeep Singh Puri Narendra Modi 
Engineers India Limited Bharat Petroleum Corporation Limited Steel Authority of India Limited Oil India Limited / ऑयल इंडिया लिमिटेड  Mangalore Refinery & Petrochemicals LTD - India 

#SureshGopi
#EnergyNowAndNext #YouAreEnergy

भारतीय साहित्य के अमर धरोहर का उत्सव, ऊर्जा का उत्सव 

#हिंदी साहित्य के महान रचनाकार जयशंकर प्रसाद जी ने भारत की प्राचीन गाथाओं को केवल संजीवनी नहीं दी, बल्कि उन्हें शौर्य और सांस्कृतिक प्रेम से संपृक्त कर दिया। 
उनका अमर नाटक 'चंद्रगुप्त' सम्राट चंद्रगुप्त मौर्य की वीरता का प्रतीक है, जो भारत की पहचान और इतिहास को एक सूत्र में जोड़ता है। 
महारत्न #ONGC भारत की इस अद्वितीय धरोहर को नमन करता है और हिंदी भाषा के गौरव एवं भारतीय #साहित्य पर इसके अमिट प्रभाव का अभिनंदन करता है।

Ministry of Petroleum and Natural Gas Govt of India Hardeep Singh Puri 
#SureshGopi
#YouAreEnergy #EnergyNowAndNext
